traits.description: Timmy enjoys the feeling of freedom that comes from being nude. he can handle clothing, but will be happier without it.
traits.name: nudist

traits.description: Timmy gets a rush from hurting people, and never minds the sight of blood or death. he is four times as likely to start a social fight as others.
traits.name: bloodlust

traits.description: Timmy is an exceptionally agreeable and giving person he rarely insults others and will sometimes offer kind words to brighten the moods of those around him he also never judges people by their appearance his agreeableness also makes him more likely to conform to prevailing opinions.
traits.name: kind

traits.description: Timmy has no empathy The suffering of others doesn't bother him at all he doesn't mind if others are butchered, left unburied, imprisoned, or sold to slavery - unless it affects him he also feels no mood boost from socializing.
traits.name: psychopath

traits.description: Timmy was taught that eating human meat is wrong and horrible. But one time, long ago, he tried it... and he liked it.
traits.name: cannibal

traits.description: Timmy always says exactly what's on his mind, especially if it's bugging him That tends to rub people the wrong way At least he doesn't mind being insulted or slighted either.
traits.name: abrasive

traits.description: Timmy is too smart for his own good. he learns everything much faster than everyone, but can be quite eccentric.
traits.name: toosmart

traits.description: Timmy likes to fight up close and personal. his accuracy is greatly increased in melee combat, but he'll be very unhappy if asked to carry a ranged weapon.
traits.name: brawler

traits.description: For Timmy, there's something exciting about getting hurt. he doesn't know why, he's just wired differently.
traits.name: masochist

traits.description: Timmy likes to be up during the night, and sleep during the day he gets a mood bonus if awake at night (23h-6h) and mood loss if awake during the day (11h-18h) he doesn't get a mood penalty for being in the dark.
traits.name: nightowl

traits.description: Timmy needs a really impressive bedroom. he gets a mood loss if he doesn't get what he wants.
traits.name: greedy

traits.description: For Timmy, it's degrading to have a less impressive bedroom than someone else he gets a mood loss if any colonist has a more impressive bedroom At least he isn't as affected by prisoners or colonists dying and he doesn't mind wearing a dead person's clothing.
traits.name: jealous

traits.description: Timmy has forsaken physical comforts and enjoyments in favor of a simple, pure lifestyle he will become unhappy if he has a bedroom that's too impressive he also dislikes fancy food and prefers to eat raw he never judges others by their appearance.
traits.name: ascetic

traits.description: Timmy is romantically attracted to people of his own gender.
traits.name: gay

traits.description: Timmy is romantically attracted to both men and women.
traits.name: bisexual

traits.description: Timmy has no sexual attraction to anyone at all.
traits.name: asexual

traits.description: Timmy's voice has a particularly grating, nasal quality to it, and he tends to talk in barked, garbled phrases. This predisposes others to dislike him.
traits.name: annoyingvoice

traits.description: Timmy breathes heavily all the time, and sweats constantly. People find it creepy.
traits.name: creepybreathing

traits.description: Timmy loves fire he will never extinguish fires To relieve stress, he will occasionally go on random fire starting sprees This happens more often if his mood is low Somehow this fascination with fire leads to a lot more inspiration.
traits.name: pyromaniac

traits.description: Timmy is weak and cowardly Even a little pain will immobilize him At least he is really good at running and for whatever reason seems to be nearly immune to toxic substances.
traits.name: wimp

traits.description: Timmy has remarkable kinesthetic intelligence. he seems to dance around danger with preternatural grace.
traits.name: nimble

traits.description: Timmy has a knack for learning. he picks things up much faster than others.
traits.name: fastlearner

traits.description:
Timmy has never learned how to learn. The motivation and talent is there, he just needs time and patience. 

    Each skill point increases global learning factor by 2%
traits.name: slowlearner

traits.description: Timmy has no need to experience the outdoors or light he will never feel cooped up or get cabin fever and is not bothered by darkness However, Timmy will be unhappy while outdoors.
traits.name: undergrounder

traits.description: Timmy feels limited in his feeble human body. he often dreams of being enhanced with artificial body parts or xenogenetics.
traits.name: bodymodder

traits.description: Timmy believes the human body is limited for a reason. To him, artificial body parts and xenogenes are unethical and disgusting.
traits.name: bodypurist

traits.description: Timmy really dislikes and distrusts men.
traits.name: misandrist

traits.description: Timmy really dislikes and distrusts women.
traits.name: misogynist

traits.description: Timmy has a fantastic memory for detail. he will learn new skills slightly faster than other people.
traits.name: greatmemory

traits.description: Timmy has thick skin, dense flesh, and durable bones he takes much less damage than other people from the same blows he stands solid like a rock, and equally unmovable.
traits.name: tough

traits.description: Timmy feels alienated and misunderstood by other human beings. he will have a constant mood debuff, but gain a chance (50%) to get a creativity inspiration after a mental break.
traits.name: torturedartist

traits.description: Timmy's life revolves around food. he gets hungry quickly but also eats faster, cooks faster and knows his ingredients, barely ever causing food poisoning.
traits.name: gourmand

traits.description: Timmy doesn't need as much sleep as the average person. Whether he's sleeping on a bed or on the ground, he will be fully rested in about two thirds the usual time.
traits.name: quicksleeper

traits.description: Timmy is always falling behind the group whenever he goes anywhere.
traits.name: slowpoke

traits.description: Timmy likes to be where he's going. he walks quicker than most people.
traits.name: fastwalker

traits.description: Timmy always moves with a sense of urgency - so much so that others often fail to keep up.
traits.name: jogger

traits.description: Timmy has an intense fascination with chemical sources of enjoyment he will consume much more of them and, if not already addicted to any drug and satisfied, will sometimes go on hard drug binges he will ignore directives to not use pleasurable drugs If there is one upside to this it's all the inspiration one can get from drugs.
traits.name: chemicalfascination

traits.description: Timmy has an unusual interest in chemical sources of enjoyment he will consume more of them and, if not already addicted to any drug and satisfied, will sometimes go on social drug binges he will ignore directives to not use pleasurable drugs If there is one upside to this it's all the inspiration one can get from drugs.
traits.name: chemicalinterest

traits.description: Timmy abhors the idea of gaining pleasure from chemicals, and avoids alcohol and pleasurable drugs. he is a hard working individual.
stats: Binging on drug mental state disabled.
Binging on drug mental state disabled.
Binging on drug mental state disabled.
Binging on drug mental state disabled.

traits.name: teetotaler

traits.description: Timmy is just naturally upbeat about his situation, pretty much all the time, no matter what it is.
traits.name: sanguine

traits.description: Timmy is naturally optimistic about life. It's hard to get him down.
traits.name: optimist

traits.description: Timmy tends to look on the bad side of life.
traits.name: pessimist

traits.description: Timmy is perenially unhappy he has trouble sustaining a good mood even when everything is fine his only way to deal with it is hiding in his room or wandering around in sadness.
traits.name: depressive

traits.description: Timmy's will is an iron shield. he keeps going through thick and thin, when others broke down long before.
traits.name: iron-willed

traits.description: Timmy is mentally tough and won't break down under stresses that would crack most people.
traits.name: steadfast

traits.description: Timmy tends to crack under pressure.
traits.name: nervous

traits.description: Timmy is on a hair-trigger all the time. he is the first to break in any tough situation. If that happens he will find something to smash.
traits.name: volatile

traits.description: Timmy likes to have things squared away he will work harder than most to attain this state of affairs, but his random mood swings can get the better of him.
traits.name: neurotic

traits.description: Timmy feels constantly nervous about everything that has to get done he will work extremely hard to attain this state of affairs, but his random mood swings can easily get the better of him.
traits.name: veryneurotic

traits.description: Timmy has an easy time staying on-task and focused, and gets things done much faster than the average person.
traits.name: industrious

traits.description: Timmy is a natural hard worker and will finish tasks faster than most.
traits.name: hardworker

traits.description: Timmy is a little bit lazy.
traits.name: lazy

traits.description: Timmy loves idleness and hates anything productive. he moves slowly and rarely stays focused on a task.
traits.name: slothful

traits.description: Timmy's mind is like a psychic tuning fork. he is extremely sensitive to psychic phenomena.
traits.name: psychicallyhypersensitive

traits.description: Timmy's mind is unusually sensitive to psychic phenomena.
traits.name: psychicallysensitive

traits.description: Timmy's mind is psychically out of tune with others. he isn't as affected by psychic phenomena.
traits.name: psychicallydull

traits.description: Timmy's mind works on a psychic frequency different from everyone else. he just isn't affected by psychic phenomena.
traits.name: psychicallydeaf

traits.description: Timmy takes more time to aim when shooting. he shoots less often than others, but with more accuracy.
traits.name: carefulshooter

traits.description: Pew! Pew! Pew! Timmy just likes pulling the trigger. he shoots faster than others, but less accurately.
traits.name: trigger-happy

traits.description: Timmy is exceptionally beautiful, with an exotic-yet-familiar facial structure and an arresting gaze People are attracted to him before he even opens his mouth.
traits.name: beautiful

traits.description: Timmy has a pretty face, which predisposes people to like him.
traits.name: pretty

traits.description: Timmy is somewhat ugly. This subtly repels others during social interactions. If there is an upside to this than that no one minds if his face has a scar or two.
traits.name: ugly

traits.description: Timmy is staggeringly ugly his face looks like a cross between a drawing by an untalented child, a malformed fetus in a jar of formaldehyde, and a piece of modern art Others must exert conscious effort to look at him while conversing If there is an upside to this than that no one minds if his face has a scar or two.. or ten.
traits.name: staggeringlyugly

traits.description: Timmy has a naturally powerful immune system. he will gain immunity much faster than a normal person would, and can survive illnesses that would kill others.
traits.name: super-immune

traits.description: Timmy has an awful immune system. he gets sick more often than usual, frequently with illnesses that nobody in the colony has been afflicted by.
traits.name: sickly

traits.description: Timmy has fragile skin and bones. he takes more damage than other people from the same blows.
traits.name: delicate

traits.description: The fewer people in Timmy's faction, the happier he is. Being alone is best of all.
traits.name: recluse

traits.description: Timmy has outstanding memory, both in terms of retaining information but also muscle memory. his skills will never decay.
traits.name: perfectmemory

traits.description: Timmy has deep knowledge of the twisted patterns of dark psychic energy he can study unnatural entities faster than others he will also periodically teach this inhuman knowledge to others when he gets the chance.
traits.name: occultist

traits.description: Timmy has the ability to make everyone feel better and inspire them to be the best version of themselves.
traits.name: joyous

traits.description: Timmy doesn't have basic needs like eating, sleeping, or comfort. his body is driven by some unknown mechanism, which has turned his eyes completely white.
traits.name: bodymastery

traits.description: Timmy is a peculiar person who seems fixated on horrendous ideas. Talking to him is often upsetting.
traits.name: disturbing

traits.description: Timmy is strangely intrigued by unnatural entities and is easily enthralled by them.
traits.name: voidfascination

traits.description: Timmy has had proper training with ranged weapons. he shoots accurately and quickly.
traits.name: expertshooter

traits.description: Timmy is uncommonly agile and stealthy, with better reflexes and a more flexible body than most.
traits.name: stealthy

traits.description:
Timmy has a special connection to animals and understands them better than most people Animals also tend to understand what he wants from them The time he spends with animals is long, but worth it Taming never causes manhunter
    Easier taming of very wild animals
traits.name: animalfriend

traits.description: Timmy is proficient with various construction materials, particularly stone he will construct anything out of stone three times as fast as others and smooth out your rocky base in no time Stone construction speed +200%
traits.name: architect

traits.description:
Timmy has a unique approach to science. he always thinks outside the box and finds inspiration for intellectual problems in art.

    Artistic increases research speed
traits.name: creativethinker

traits.description: Timmy seems to have rented all the good fortune on this Rimworld.
traits.name: fortunate

traits.description: Timmy has a special talent to grow plants and nurture them even in hostile enviroments he can grow any plant, even if other people would fail due to their lack of skills he would like some plants in his bedroom Can grow any plant regardless of skill
traits.name: greenthumb

traits.description: Timmy is a gun nut, his life revolves around guns, how they are crafted, maintained and used Quite a handy skill in these circumstances Just don't hand him a melee weapon.
traits.name: gunnut

traits.description: Timmy is exceptionally coordinated with his hands.
traits.name: hand-eyecoordination

traits.description: Timmy has a keen eye and can spot even tiny mineral deposits he will occassionally find small clumps of resources when mining any sort of stone or ore Chance increased for flatter terrain.
traits.name: keeneye

traits.description: Timmy has had their fair share of encounters with mechanoids he has become an expert in mechanoid construction and combat, making him uniquely suited to disassemble and fight them Damage versus mechanoids +50%
traits.name: mechanoidexpert

traits.description:
Timmy wants thing to be exactly right. This does take time, but the results speak for themselves.

    Quality level +1 (50% chance)
traits.name: perfectionist

traits.description: Timmy knows exactly the right words for every situation. This also means his insults hurt more.
traits.name: silvertongue

traits.description:
Timmy has particularly steady hands, which don't even tremble in dire circumstances or when he himself is injured.

    No self-tend penalty
traits.name: steadyhands

traits.description: Timmy has a very strong back or is part mule or something. he can carry significantly more as a normal person.
traits.name: strongback

traits.description: Timmy is able to use oversized weapons.
traits.name: giant

traits.description:
Timmy learns faster in skills they lack passion in.

(This increase to no-passion learning will not show in the skill UI)
traits.name: diligentstudent

traits.description:
Timmy learns much faster in skills they lack passion in.

(This increase to no-passion learning will not show in the skill UI)
traits.name: verydiligentstudent

traits.description: There is something about Timmy that makes predators not consider them prey
traits.name: animalfriend

traits.description: Timmy loves alcohol. he will never stop being addicted to it.
traits.name: alcohollover

traits.description: Timmy has a gentle and cool-headed nature. he is less likely to insult others or starts fights, and will sometimes cheer up others.
traits.name: gentle

traits.description: Timmy doesn't react to insults or to either part failing a flirt attempt.
traits.name: uninsultable

traits.description: Timmy isn't bothered by rough appearances, a bit of rough living. Timmy also doesn't care as much for royal titles.
traits.name: unpretentious

traits.description: Timmy is truly gigantic by the standards of their kind They are sturdier than usual, but being significantly larger than normal for their kind does slow them down somewhat and make them more prone to early heart attacks and other health-issues.
traits.name: gigantism

traits.description: Timmy is both taller and bulkier than usual for their kind. This makes them sturdier but slightly slower.
traits.name: large

traits.description: Timmy is a bit smaller than usual for their kind.
traits.name: small

traits.description: Timmy is much smaller than usual for their kind.
traits.name: dwarfism

traits.description: Timmy is confident that everything will work out for the best.
traits.name: confident

traits.description: Timmy is seriously overweight. he moves slowly, and works even slower.
traits.name: overweight

traits.description: Timmy has honed his mind and body for most of his life.
traits.name: athletic

traits.description: Timmy demonstrates neat skill, especially with his hands.
traits.name: dexterous

traits.description: Timmy has a keen eye, and can quickly spot a target.
traits.name: perceptive

traits.description: Timmy is fastidious to a fault.
traits.name: clean

traits.description: Timmy has a hard time seeing things clearly unless he is relatively close to it.
traits.name: near-sighted

traits.description: Timmy has always picked up skills pretty quickly.
traits.name: quicklearner

traits.description: Some people use a spoon to eat. Timmy uses a shovel...
traits.name: glutton

traits.description: Timmy is good at persuading someone to do or believe something through reasoning or the use of temptation.
traits.name: persuasive

traits.description: Timmy could sleep through an earthquake.
traits.name: heavysleeper

traits.description: Timmy is an extreme pervert. he doesn't mind sharing a room, or streaking. It makes others feel incredibly uncomfortable.
traits.name: pervert

traits.description: Ashes to ashes and dust to dust. Timmy is fascinated by corpses and decay.
traits.name: morbid

traits.description: Timmy takes medicine very seriously. he wants to do no harm and isn't afraid to take longer to do the job right.
traits.name: carefulsurgeon

traits.description: Sometimes it's hard to tell where the knife stops and Timmy starts. People like to say that "if it bleeds Timmy can skin it and split it".
traits.name: naturalbutcher

traits.description: Timmy is loved by animals, but people don't feel quite the same.
traits.name: lovedbyanimals

traits.description: Strange new ideas just appear in the mind of Timmy. Researching new technology comes easily to Timmy, but he always seems distracted.
traits.name: geniusinventor

traits.description: Timmy has a passion for gardening. he knows exactly what a plant needs to grow happily.
traits.name: greenthumb

traits.description: Timmy doesn't like to waste materials. he takes great care in his work.
traits.name: efficientbuilder

traits.description: Timmy knows how to exploit the cleavage of rocks. he doesn't understand why plants are so much more fragile though.
traits.name: fastminer

traits.description: They say a sucker is born every minute, and Timmy is that sucker.
traits.name: sucker

traits.description: Timmy likes to haggle. he gets better prices than most people.
traits.name: amateurhaggler

traits.description: Timmy always gets the best deals - so much so that others often fail to realize they're being duped.
traits.name: hagglingenthusiast

traits.description: The elephant in the room is named Timmy.
traits.name: awkward

traits.description: "That's a lotta graves. Lotta holes to fill. Bow-Chicka-Bow-Wow" - Timmy, probably.
traits.name: tucker

traits.description: Timmy could talk for days on end and people would still listen to that sweet voice.
traits.name: melodicvoice

traits.description: Subtle is the game of diplomacy, and subtle, Timmy is not.
traits.name: uncouth

traits.description: Timmy knows how to grease the wheels of diplomacy.
traits.name: diplomatic

traits.description: Timmy has such a way with him words and gifts that he always manages to cool down a tense situation.
traits.name: verydiplomatic

traits.description: Timmy has never held a gun in him hands. The weight of the cold metal in him hands makes he shudder uncontrollably.
traits.name: shootingamateur

traits.description: Timmy knows him way with a gun.
traits.name: shootingenthusiast

traits.description: "My rifle is my best friend. It is my life. I must master it as I must master my life." - Timmy, probably.
traits.name: shootingprofessional

traits.description: Brave Timmy, born with impossible strength and force of will.
traits.name: herculean

traits.description: Timmy is said to have been dipped in the river of death, he seems invulnerable in battle.
traits.name: achillean

traits.description: Craftier by far than any mortal man, Timmy is also a very capable warrior.
traits.name: odyssean

traits.description: Feared by him enemies and worshiped by warriors, Timmy is a bloodthirsty embodiment of war.
traits.name: ares'wrath

traits.description: Timmy's natural instinct to protect and nurture the people led him to champion the hunt.
traits.name: artemis'blessing

traits.description: Patron of the arts and student of the bow, Timmy will bring beauty to his world, one way or another.
traits.name: apollo'sharmony

traits.description: Timmy knows where the riches are buried, he also knows that the dead can't take it with them.
traits.name: hades'wealth

traits.description: So wondrous is Timmy to behold that one look can inspire tears, desire, jealousy, and love.
traits.name: aphrodite'sgrace

traits.description: Timmy has a special connection with plants, they grow, flower, and die at his order.
traits.name: demeter'sbounty

traits.description: Companion to creatures both mundane and fantastic, Timmy protects and nurtures his flock.
traits.name: pan'sblessing

traits.description: Timmy crafts with fire and forge as an artist would with paint and brush.
traits.name: hephaestus'forge

traits.description: Timmy's healing can cure the sick and keep death itself at bay.
traits.name: asclepius'healing

traits.description: Timmy commands the wisdom of the ages. he is a master tactician and inventor extraordinaire with few intellectual rivals.
traits.name: athena'swisdom

traits.description: Timmy only speed is fast. he is quick to close a deal and even quicker to close a distance.
traits.name: hermes'haste

traits.description: Timmy sends to sleep those who suffer, the new day bringing good health to them.
traits.name: imhotep'swisdom

traits.description: Timmy is a successful product of an ancient experimental project, he almost entirely specialized for combat. he is extremely hard to defeat.
traits.name: successfulproducts

traits.description: Timmy is a fashion guy who is skilled at shooting in a slide shovel, he can use gun to blast everything he sees.
traits.name: fashionguy

traits.description: Timmy was implanted with an excessive amount of parasites, which completely destroyed his sanity but greatly increased his strength.
traits.name: parasiticfailedproduct

traits.description: Either the body or mind of Timmy is one of insight and experience. While some find them old fashioned, others will respect their guidance.

data.mod: Vanilla Ideology Expanded - Memes and Structures

traits.name: elder

traits.description: A strict principle of nonviolence which applies to all living things.
traits.name: vowofnonviolence

traits.description: By some strange twist of fate, people killed by Timmy die violently. You always see the worst way a person can die.
traits.name: bloodymess

traits.description: Timmy is always ready with a flirtatious comment or a playful compliment, lifting the spirits of those around him he has a knack for making others feel special and desired, however this may sometimes lead to complicated situations when his playful intentions are misinterpreted.
traits.name: flirty

traits.description: Timmy is exceptionally empathetic and sensitive to the suffering of others Whenever he witnesses pain or hardship, it deeply affects him, resulting in memories of these events haunting Timmy for a much longer time.
traits.name: distressed

traits.description: Timmy is obsessed with germs and will wash much more frequently than normal.
traits.name: germaphobe

traits.description: Timmy is very hygienic and will wash more frequently.
traits.name: hygienic

traits.description: Timmy is very unhygienic and will wash less frequently.
traits.name: unhygienic

traits.description: Timmy has very low standards of cleanliness and will only wash when they absolutely have to.
traits.name: slob

traits.description: Timmy enjoys the solitude and tranquility inherent to long fishing sessions. he will prefer fishing above other activities.
traits.name: fisherman

traits.description: Timmy is entombed in a warcasket No amount of pain will have an effect on them, and they can never go into a pain shock or drop unconscious due to pain Because of how bulky the armor is and how much energy it takes to use it, Timmy is not capable of doing any work.
traits.name: warcasket

traits.description: Timmy was entombed in a warcasket, and then brutally pulled out of one The neural and nerve damage from being unplugged is so severe that Timmy is in constant, agonizing pain and can barely assemble his thoughts Only installing Timmy back in a warcasket can cure the symptoms.
traits.name: shellcasket

traits.description: Psychic enthrallment caused by incredibly strong mental influence. Thralls don't need to sleep or have recreation, but are unable to do skilled work and engage in social interactions.
traits.name: thrall

traits.description: Timmy's mind is dominated by the psychic patterns of the void They are completely disconnected from human concerns of family, friendship, and love Their experience of reality is distant and muted, guided by the psychic rhythm of a dark hyperintelligence.
traits.name: inhumanized

traits.description: Timmy has seen the depths of the void and drank from its essence It lives inside them still, guiding their actions and twisting their flesh It has turned their hair brittle and white They no longer need sleep or comfort The void provides for them.
traits.name: voidtouched

traits.description: Timmy is terrified of germs and contamination, leading to excessively slow and meticulous cleaning, but due to the careful nature will never contract flu, malaria, or plague.
traits.name: germaphobe

traits.description: Timmy is desperately afraid of commitment. he will actively refuse any attachment to others, and will never form any new relationships.
traits.name: noncommittal

traits.description: Timmy's emotional foundation is fragile, making him significantly more prone to crumbling under stress he struggle to handle pressure, which often leads to breakdowns in challenging situations.
traits.name: impulsive

traits.description: Timmy hyperfocuses on certain things when he feel like it, but most of the time he will struggle to concentrate on his task, severely affecting his work speed.
traits.name: distractable

traits.description: Timmy suffers from severe mood swings that can last anything between a day and a quadrum. One day he might be extremely happy, whilst the next day - extremely sad.
traits.name: moodswings

traits.description: Timmy tends to let his mind drift, even in the middle of work. he may sometimes stop tasks at random.
traits.name: absent-minded

traits.description: Timmy has a screw loose, but it comes with a sharper scientific mind.
traits.name: eccentric

traits.description: Timmy strives for perfection in his work he produces higher-quality products, but works more slowly Failing to meet his standards causes unhappiness, and on rare occasions he may abandon a project mid-way.
traits.name: perfectionist

traits.description: Timmy's instincts lean heavily toward cowardice. In danger, he will often hide or run before standing to fight.
traits.name: coward

traits.description: Timmy has stronger mental and physical fortitude than most. he can endure pain more readily, and is slower to break under harsh conditions.
traits.name: brave

traits.description: Minor bruises and scrapes plague Timmy, usually from tripping or falling due to poor coordination.
traits.name: clumsy

traits.description: Timmy enjoys the heat of a dry summer day. he doesn't mind working up a sweat or sleeping in warmth.
traits.name: heatinclined

traits.description: Timmy enjoys the chill of a brisk winter night. he doesn't mind shivering or sleeping in the cold.
traits.name: coldinclined

traits.description: A bomb could go off beside Timmy while he sleeps, and he would keep right on sleeping. he can't be bothered to work or defend the colony mid-nap.
traits.name: heavysleeper

traits.description: Timmy is naturally hygienic and organized. he doesn't track dirt or scatter trash, and enjoys cleaning.
traits.name: neat

traits.description: Timmy is naturally sloppy, leaving trash and dirt scattered around. At least he isn't much bothered by messy surroundings.
traits.name: slob

traits.description: Timmy struggles to take breaks or rest mid-job. he will keep working, even at the expense of his health or sleep.
traits.name: workaholic

traits.description: Timmy has never known nausea. Food poisoning and vomiting are foreign to him.
traits.name: ironstomach

traits.description: Timmy can't stand cruelty toward animals he feels happier when nuzzled or acting as master to a tamed animal, but is more deeply upset when losing one he also refuses to butcher animals.
traits.name: animallover

traits.description: Timmy believes in human superiority over animals. he dislikes bonding or being nuzzled, but feels satisfaction when animals die or are sold.
traits.name: animalhater

traits.description: Whether from bulk or awkward posture, Timmy has broken a few chairs in his time, and is likely to break more.
traits.name: big-boned

traits.description: Timmy only plays by his own rules. When forced, he will drag his feet and work more slowly.
traits.name: rebel

traits.description: Timmy needs clear direction on when and how to act. he works at normal speed only when ordered, and otherwise slows down.
traits.name: submissive

traits.description: Timmy is fueled by spite. he cant stand sharing the colony with rivals, and feels happier when one of them dies.
traits.name: vengeful

traits.description: Whether from trauma or fear of change, Timmy rejects modernity. he may lash out at machines, refuses to research, and feels satisfaction from destroying mechanoids.
traits.name: technophobe

traits.description: Timmy lives for a good time. he remembers parties fondly, and the joy lasts far longer than it does for most.
traits.name: fun-loving

traits.description: Timmy has limited mental capacity. he learns slowly and struggles with conversation, but tends to be naturally happy.
traits.name: dunce

traits.description: Timmy has trained in melee combat and learned a special move to disarm opponents.
traits.name: martialartist

traits.description: Timmy believes they belong in high society, and loves nothing more than critiquing art and brushing elbows with royalty.
traits.name: snob

traits.description: Timmy gets a sour stomach around blood or corpses. Vomiting is just part of life for him.
traits.name: squeamish

traits.description: Timmy is naturally anxious, especially in social situations. he avoids gatherings and sometimes retreats to his room to cope.
traits.name: anxious

traits.description: No amount of lovin is ever enough for Timmy. he tends to move between partners and seeks intimacy often.
traits.name: insatiable

traits.description: Timmy gives his body only to a spouse and would never initiate divorce. he also dislikes nudity more than most.
traits.name: prude

traits.description: An armchair and a screen are all Timmy needs to be happy. he never tires of watching television, and always feels good after.
traits.name: couchpotato

traits.description: Timmy enjoys the company of cats and gravitates toward bonding with them, but dislikes dogs.
traits.name: catperson

traits.description: Timmy enjoys the company of dogs and gravitates toward bonding with them, but dislikes cats.
traits.name: dogperson

traits.description: Timmy has a sharp, logical mind. he researches faster than most, and his rational outlook makes him less prone to mental breaks.
traits.name: prodigy

traits.description: Timmy believes animals are essential to life and society. he feels happier with more of them around, and is especially skilled at taming and training.
traits.name: menagerist

traits.description: The sea calls to Timmy. he feels happier when near the ocean or a deep river.
traits.name: oceanlover

traits.description: The mountains call to Timmy. he feels happier when near a large mountain.
traits.name: mountainlover

traits.description: Timmy hides a twisted obsession he treats organ harvesting as a dark experiment and takes pleasure in it Harvesting makes him happy, but going too long without fuels growing unrest.
traits.name: madsurgeon

traits.description: Timmy fights best when drunk. he grows more dangerous in melee the more intoxicated he becomes.
traits.name: drunkenmaster

traits.description: Timmy is compelled to steal, even from guests and allies, risking angering others.
traits.name: kleptomaniac

traits.description: Smokeleaf is a way of life for Timmy. he adores it and would rather die than give it up.
traits.name: stoner

traits.description: Alcohol is a way of life for Timmy. he adores drinking and would rather die than give it up.
traits.name: lush

traits.description: Timmy loves to travel and feels happiest on the move. he grows restless when staying too long in one place, but moves quickly and forages well while caravanning.
traits.name: wanderlust

traits.description: Timmy is never fully asleep or awake. he lurches along in a slow, shambler-like state, and only sleeps once every few days.
traits.name: insomniac

traits.description: Timmy has grown tired of the world. he struggles with bleak thoughts, making his personality difficult to befriend.
traits.name: worldweary

traits.description: Timmy is hardened by old emotional trauma. he feels nothing from death or loss, whether animal, colonist, family, or prisoner.
traits.name: desensitized

traits.description: Only the finest meals satisfy Timmy. he feels indifferent toward ordinary food, but savors lavish meals and gains greater joy from them.
traits.name: refinedpalate

traits.description: Through scholastic pursuit, Timmy has become well-read. he excels in science and medicine, and tends patients with greater skill.
traits.name: academian

traits.description: Timmy believes infrastructure is everything. he is a natural builder and stoneworker, constructing and mining with greater speed and efficiency.
traits.name: groundbreaker

traits.description: To Timmy, food is art. he creates beautiful, delicious meals that are almost always safe to eat.
traits.name: gastronomist

traits.description: Flora and fauna are vital to Timmy. he uses every part of plants and animals, and appreciates natures gifts.
traits.name: ecologist

traits.description: Timmy has an eye for silver and a silver tongue to match. he values his own goods highly, and convinces others to do the same.
traits.name: tycoon

traits.description: Timmy is strangely hypercoagulating and will bleed much more slowly than most.
traits.name: thickskinned

traits.description: Timmy is strangely hemophilic and tends to bleed much more profusely than others.
traits.name: thinskinned

traits.description: Timmy bottles up his feelings for long stretches of time. When the pressure grows too great, he may suddenly break down.
traits.name: schizoid

traits.description: Timmy hates and distrusts xenos. They see them as little more than animals.
traits.name: xenophobe

traits.description: Timmy thinks aliens are exotic and interesting. They would love to get to know them more and wouldn't mind forming relationships with them.
traits.name: xenophile

traits.description: Timmy likes making apparel. he can work wonders with a needle and thread, a hammer and anvil, not so much.
traits.name: naturaltailor

traits.description: Timmy is an eccentric artist. he has an affinity for the arts, but he often gets lost in his work and forgets to take care of himself.
traits.name: eccentricartist

traits.description: A traumatic experience in his past has caused Timmy to be irrationally scared of animals and he refuses to go anywhere near them.
traits.name: zoophobic

traits.description: Timmy struggles with abstract concepts and can't really grasp things that he is unable to physically touch or mess with Timmy looks at everything purely logically with no room for wonder or superstition.
traits.name: unimaginative

traits.description: Timmy gets nauseous and dizzy at the sight of blood, so much so that he is too busy heaving to actually do anything.
traits.name: hemophobic

traits.description: Timmy was burned very badly by an out-of-control fire when he was young and it still haunts him to this day he can't even handle a small stove fire without trembling.
traits.name: pyrophobia

traits.description: Timmy lacks any semblance of grace or poise. he doesnt "walk" as much as he constantly falls and catches himself.
traits.name: clumsy

traits.description: Timmy is quite smitten with himself and wont do any work he views as beneath his.
traits.name: narcissist

traits.description: Timmy isn't particularly bright and really struggles with any form of higher thinking he'll learn slower than most and can't do any thinking-heavy jobs, but at least he seems happy
traits.name: dunce

traits.description: Timmy hates the feeling of being trapped and gets uncomfortable in enclosed rooms and tunnels. he much prefers the open air.
traits.name: claustrophobic

traits.description: For some inexplicable reason, Timmy can't handle being around plants. It makes him feel dizzy and puts him in quite a bad mood.
traits.name: botanophobic

traits.description: Either due to brain damage, physical limitations, or past trauma, Timmy is unable to speak.
traits.name: mute

traits.description: All his life Timmy has wondered what was on the other side of the veil, and he has dedicated his life to discovering this mystery he has seen unseeable things, and has learned unknowable truths, but as a result his mind has become unstable.
traits.name: darkcuriosity

traits.description: Timmy is constantly looking over his shoulder and worries about things both real and imagined he's unusually vigilant and cautious, but it really gets to him, especially anything unusual or unexplainable.
traits.name: paranoid

traits.description: Timmy has no sense of taste, and as such he is unable to enjoy or dislike food. he just eats it and moves on without a second thought.
traits.name: ageusia

traits.description: Whether he was born lacking it or lost it somewhere along the way, Timmy has no sense of smell.
traits.name: anosmia

traits.description: Due to issues with their nerves, Timmy has no sense of touch he can't feel pain, and he often has to check to make sure he hasnt hurt himself Anything requiring lots of delicate touching is a struggle for him
traits.name: hypoesthesia

traits.description: Timmy feels horrible after eating, and as such he will put it off for as long as Timmy can, regardless of how damaging it is for his body he isn't particularly interested in cooking food either.
traits.name: anorexic

traits.description: Timmy has a free spirit and loves to waltz around aimlessly he will get to go where he wants to be faster, but when things get hard he may drop everything to go for a lovely stroll he might even feel energized afterwards, assuming he comes back.
traits.name: wanderer

traits.description: Timmy craves pleasure and savors it with reckless abandon. If it feels good, Timmy wants it.
traits.name: hedonistic

traits.description: Timmy is obsessed about his health, and worries about contracting all manners of disease no matter how irrational. he stays very clean and stressed as a result.
traits.name: hypochondriac

traits.description: Timmy lives for thrills and rushes, and is more willing to engage in risky behavior. Sometimes this pays off for him and othertimes it doesn't.
traits.name: daredevil

traits.description: Timmy has a hard time falling and staying asleep. he needs to stay in bed longer than others to get the same amount of sleep.
traits.name: insomniac

traits.description: Due to uncontrollable health problems, Timmy is infertile and cannot have biological children
traits.name: infertile

traits.description: Timmy is fascinated with technology and always wants shiny new toys. he is hopelessly in love with learning new tech and will do so at a faster rate than others.
traits.name: technophile

traits.description: Timmy has lived a hard life, and has watched many of the people he cares about die. Death has lost all meaning to him.
traits.name: morbid

traits.description: Evasive wording and sarcasm is Timmy's bread and butter when it comes to social situations. It makes it hard to take anything he says seriously.
traits.name: disingenuous

traits.description: Timmy means every single word he says, and never lies to avoid hurting someones feelings or to make them feel better than they are Everyone takes what Timmy says to heart.
traits.name: earnest

traits.description: Timmy doesn't have much faith in his beliefs and can easily be swayed by one he sees as more appealing When times are hard, he often blames what he believes in.
traits.name: doubtful

traits.description: Timmy is extremely devoted to his beliefs and won't be easily swayed. When things are hard, Timmy finds strength and purpose in what he believes.
traits.name: devout

traits.description: Timmy has a very short fuse and tends to blow up at the smallest slights and annoyances.
traits.name: tempermental

traits.description: Timmy is a very patient person that is willing to put up with more than most and hear people out.
traits.name: patient

traits.description: Timmy gets easily distracted with talking and daydreaming when he eats, causing him to take much longer to finish his meal.
traits.name: sloweater

traits.description: Timmy has places he would rather be and things he would rather do, and as a result he eats his food much faster than others.
traits.name: fasteater

traits.description: Timmy is just naturally good at everything he does. However, this does have the tragic side effect of Timmy never really learning how to practice or study.
traits.name: gifted

traits.description: Timmy might not seem like much, but with hard work and time he can become something amazing.
traits.name: potential

traits.description: Timmy is unusualy small for a person his age.
traits.name: petite

traits.description:
Timmy likes to be up during the day, and sleep during the night.

he gets a mood penalty if awake at night (23h-6h) and mood bonus if awake during the day (11h-18h).

data.mod: Expanded Biotech Style Genes - All in One

traits.name: earlybird

traits.description: Timmy rejects ranged weapons, instead he focuses on mastering his blade and footwork.
traits.name: kensei

traits.description: Timmy is a formally trained samurai and the backbone of any clan's army, he is versitile, hits hard and is even harder to kill.
traits.name: samurai

traits.description: Timmy is a practitioner of The Way of The Bow, his well placed shots can be the deciding factor in the outcome of a fight.
traits.name: wayofthebow

traits.description: Timmy is a masterless warrior, his life on the road has been tough, but it has strengthened his body and mind.
traits.name: ronin

traits.description: Timmy's brain works a little differently. he will be better suited to indoors activities, and needs more accomodations. But Timmy will be all the more efficient for them.
traits.name: autistic

traits.description: Timmy's brain works a little differently he will be better suited to outdoor activities, and needs more accomodations and recreation time But Timmy will be all the more efficient for them.
traits.name: autistic

traits.description: Timmy's brain works a little differently. he is a free soul who needs a nonverbal way to express hisself, special accomodations, and more recreation time.
traits.name: autistic

traits.description: Timmy's brain works a little differently he has a deep passion for construction, and knows his way around the craft Careful not to overwork hisself, he needs special accomodations and more recreation time.
traits.name: autistic

traits.description: Timmy's brain works a little differently, but he absolutely loves people, and is pretty good with social interactions he needs special accomodations and more recreation time.
traits.name: autistic

traits.description: Timmy's brain works a little differently. he has a passion for geology, but little else. his needs in accomodations and recreation time are above average.
traits.name: autistic

traits.description: Timmy's brain works a little differently. he has a passion for food, but little else. his needs in accomodations and recreation time are above average.
traits.name: autistic

traits.description: Timmy's brain works a little differently he has a driving passion for field work, but isn't well suited to do much else he needs special accomodations and lots of recreation time.
traits.name: autistic

traits.description: Timmy's brain works a little differently he has a driving passion for taking care of animals, but isn't well suited to do much else he needs special accomodations and lots of recreation time.
traits.name: autistic

traits.description: Timmy's brain works a little differently he has a driving passion for doctoring, but isn't well suited to do much else he needs special accomodations and lots of recreation time.
traits.name: autistic

traits.description: Timmy's brain works a little differently he really can't do any work, and although he is autonomous enought to take care of hisself, he can't do much else he will need special accomodations and lots of recreation time.
traits.name: autistic

traits.description: Timmy's brain works a little differently he isn't well-suited to most work, and requires special accomodations and lots of recreation time If his needs aren't met, he becomes moody very easily.
traits.name: autistic

traits.description: Timmy detests manual labor, feeling that tasks such as cleaning and hauling are beneath him he will perform such tasks more slowly than others would, and will also carry less per load when required to haul.
traits.name: hatesdumblabor

traits.description: Timmy is comfortable with isolation. he does not have a need for intimacy.
traits.name: solitary

traits.description: Timmy is quite the social butterfly. he has an increased need for intimacy.
traits.name: affectionate

traits.description: Timmy possesses an unnatural, almost pristine beauty that makes him stand out among others of his kind.
traits.name: angelicbeauty

traits.description: Timmy is so unfathomably ugly and grotesque that merely looking at him is enough to make other people nauseous.
traits.name: repulsive

traits.description: Family is everything for Timmy. Timmy enjoys being around family members and knows the way around kids. Family joys and sorrows resonate with his more than others.
traits.name: familyperson

traits.description: Timmy has extensive experience in construction and crafting. he will work faster than others and nearly always succeed at construction and repairs.
traits.name: craftsmaster

traits.description: Timmy has extensive experience in cooking. he will cook faster than others and never cause food poisoning.
traits.name: masterchef

traits.description: Timmy is predisposed towards violence and will frequently try to harm others.
traits.name: violentmind

traits.description: Once in a while Timmy will sleepwalk.
traits.name: occasionalsleepwalker

traits.description: For some unknown reason causes Timmy to do some weird things during sleep.
traits.name: sleepwalker

traits.description: Timmy enjoys sleepwalking almost every night. Maybe the bed is not comfortable enough?
traits.name: usualsleepwalker

traits.description: This person is proficient with low-tech equipment.
traits.name: low-techproficient

traits.description: This person is proficient with firearm equipment.
traits.name: firearmproficient

traits.description: This person is proficient with high-tech equipment.
traits.name: high-techproficient

races.description: A baseline human, mostly unmodified by gene engineering and mostly unchanged by evolutionary pressures on non-Earth planets.
races.name: human

races.description: A baseline human, mostly unmodified by gene engineering and mostly unchanged by evolutionary pressures on non-Earth planets.
races.name: human

races.description: This is a creature largely composed of highly ruggedized machinery.
races.name: mech
